entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • v9 SDK doesn't print nupkg path on `dotnet pack` #43248
  • [NETSDKE2E] With NET9 RC1 SDK installed, the output in ‘’dotnet workload –info” should be displayed as workload sets after installing the workload set from global.json. #43240

Closed

  • Template instantiation failure on Windows Template Engine tests #43246
  • Template instantiation failure on Windows Template Engine tests #43245

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove the non-windows package verification message. #43251
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Cloak sRGB.icm from VMR #43249
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43247
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Use PortableRid config value for self-contained publish test #43244
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix issues with Blazor WASM delta applier #43152
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Warn when enabling Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #43039
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-NetSDK, 8.0.10
  • Use PortableRid config value for self-contained publish test #43234
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [VMR] Add "buildPass" parameter to vmr-build jobs templates #43193
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #43238
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add an implicit reference to the Generate SBOM task #43151
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add code to containers check to allow users to silence it #42501
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • remove check now that NuGet/Home#7801 is fixed #43107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add basic guidelines for telemetry usage for tooling authors #43097
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge the net10 dotnet/runtime and dotnet/aspnetcore codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up error experience when downloading non-tools #43045
    untriaged, Area-Tools, 9.0.1xx
  • [Blazor] Fix hot reload for components with collocated JS files #43199
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix the minimum supported version for targeting net9 #43142
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-NetSDK, 8.0.10
  • Search version in set #43096
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update dotnet test protocol messages #43226
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Shutdown toolset compilers #43135
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #43196
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Summary of how we do localization in this repo #43202
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
